actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-750.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1516) to require annual appropriations of funds necessary to support timber management and resource conservation on the Tongass National Forest.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1516 (Tongass National Forest).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1516) to require annual appropriations of funds necessary to support timber management and resource conservation on the Tongass National Forest.
